articles.title: Six Dead, Pune Flooded, Mumbai Airport Chaos As Rains Batter Maharashtra - NDTV
articles.description: Four people have died - three were electrocuted - in Pune, two drowned after falling into Thane's Barvi Dam, and a red alert has been declared for Mumbai and Palghar after heavy rainfall, overnight and this morning, battered Maharashtra.
articles.content:
Pune Mumbai Rain Live News: Mumbai and Pune face rain red alerts till 8.30 am Friday.

articles.title: IIT Kanpur prof finds 'Super Jupiter' exoplanet using James Webb telescope - Business Standard
articles.description: The newly discovered planet, more massive than Jupiter, orbits a K-type star Epsilon Indi A (Eps Ind A), which shares similarities in age with our Sun but is slightly cooler

articles.title: Setback to Centre as Supreme Court rules royalty on minerals is not tax - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The top court held that states have the legislative competence to impose taxes on mines and minerals-bearing lands under the Constitution. | Latest News India
articles.content:
In a landmark verdict, the Supreme Court on Thursday dealt a major blow to the Centre ruling that the royalty payable on minerals does not constitute a tax.
